ygData.subject: Re: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: My point of this is that since wizards rely on magic so much, why do we not get more mana then say a druid.  A druid has like one song that needs magic and can
ygData.messageBody:
My point of this is that since wizards rely on magic so much, why do we not get
more mana then say a druid. A druid has like one song that needs magic and can
hit hard. I am not complaining about the way the classes are set up..I am just
saying that Verant should create the classes correctly. Wizards are known for
magic = more mana points. Druids use less magic = less mana points.

MICHAEL CALHOUN wrote:

> From: MICHAEL CALHOUN <ninxf@...>
>
> Now please correct me if I am wrong. Why does a druid have the same
> amount of mana as a wizard?
>
>
